contexts.context: ...quoque signo … — … et secunda hora connumerantur <mark>scorpioni</mark> et sic deinceps.
...a missed out phrase "simulque piscis cauda cancri pes <mark>scorpioni</mark> pars". (104va) Al, II Eratosthenis de...
...… — … De scorpione … quae in ueneno <mark>scorpionis</mark> serpentis. End imperfect with a cross marking perhaps...
